results.stdout:
usage: ofs [-h] [--version]
           {get-path,list,list-projects,list-bidders,find-bidder,list-docs,root,tree,read-doc,kriterien,index}
           ...

OFS (Opinionated Filesystem) - Access and manage tender documentation

positional arguments:
  {get-path,list,list-projects,list-bidders,find-bidder,list-docs,root,tree,read-doc,kriterien,index}
                        Available commands
    get-path            Get the path for a given name (AUSSCHREIBUNGNAME or
                        BIETERNAME)
    list                List all available items in the OFS
    list-projects       List all project names (AUSSCHREIBUNGNAME)
    list-bidders        List all bidder names (BIETERNAME) in a project
    find-bidder         Find a specific bidder within a project
    list-docs           List documents (default: name + basic metadata)
    root                Show the OFS root directory
    tree                Show tree structure of projects, bidders, and
                        documents
    read-doc            Read a document by identifier
                        'Project@Bidder@Filename'
    kriterien           Analyze criteria from JSON files for a project
    index               Manage OFS index files for faster access

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --version             show program's version number and exit

For more information, see the documentation.
